title: Quest Difficulties

properties.name: description
properties.value: Quest difficulties are official measures of the level strenuousness in a quest. The different levels are in order from least difficult to most difficult as follows:

content:
Quest Classifications
Novice
Intermediate
Experienced
Master
Grandmaster
Special

Quest difficulties are official measures of the level strenuousness in a quest. The different levels are in order from least difficult to most difficult as follows:

  • Novice
  • Intermediate
  • Experienced
  • Master
  • Grandmaster

There is an additional official level:

  • Special
rawContent:
{{QuestClass|align=right}}
'''Quest difficulties''' are official measures of the level strenuousness in a [[Quests|quest]]. The different levels are in order from least difficult to most difficult as follows: 
*[[Quests/Novice|Novice]]
*[[Quests/Intermediate|Intermediate]]
*[[Quests/Experienced|Experienced]]
*[[Quests/Master|Master]]
*[[Quests/Grandmaster|Grandmaster]]

There is an additional official level:
*[[Quests/Special|Special]]
